SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNAT
AND QNA_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND QNA_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND QNA_ANSWER LIKE #{qnaAnswer}
AND QNA_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchDateStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AND TO_DATE(#{searchDateEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY QNA_ID DESC

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT QNA_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(QNA_DATE, 'MM/DD') QNA_DATE, U.USER_ID, USER_NAME, QNA_ANSWER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA_COMMENTT WHERE COMMENT_QNAID = Q.QNA_ID) AS QNA_COMMENT_CNT FROM QNAT Q, USERT U
AND QNA_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND QNA_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND QNA_ANSWER LIKE #{qnaAnswer}
AND QNA_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{searchDateStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD' ) AND TO_DATE(#{searchDateEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
ORDER BY QNA_ID DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}
SELECT QNA_ID, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(QNA_DATE, 'MM/DD') QNA_DATE, U.USER_ID, USER_NAME, QNA_ANSWER FROM QNAT Q, USERT U WHERE Q.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND QNA_ID = #{qnaId}
